item.title: Tedopon add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "Nobody owns life, but anyone who can pick up a frying pan owns death." -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "Language is a virus from outer space" -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "I don't care if people hate my guts; I assume most of them do. The important question is whether they are in a position to do anything about it." -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by Louis-Ferdinand Celine
item.description: "To hell with reality! I want to die in music, not in reason or in prose. People don't deserve the restraint we show by not going into delirium in front of them. To hell with them!" -- Louis-Ferdinand Celine

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by Jim Thompson
item.description: "Life is a bucket of shit with a barbed wire handle." -- Jim Thompson

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "It never got weird enough for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by Buddha
item.description: "Let us rise up and be thankful, for if we didn't learn a lot at least we learned a little, and if we didn't learn a little, at least we didn't get sick, and if we got sick, at least we didn't die; so, let us all be thankful." -- Buddha

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "Nobody wants to be here and nobody wants to leave." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by Timothy Leary
item.description: "Turn on, Tune in, Drop out" -- Timothy Leary

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by Robert Anton Wilson
item.description: "The Bible tells us to be like God, and then on page after page it describes God as a mass murderer. This may be the single most important key to the political behavior of Western Civilization." -- Robert Anton Wilson

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "If you want a picture of the future, imagine a boot stamping on a human faceâ€”for ever." -- George Orwell

item.title: Tedopon add a quote by Aleister Crowley
item.description: "Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law." -- Aleister Crowley
